deleteOnTermination.description: Whether or not to delete the network interface on instance termination. Defaults to `false`. Currently, the only valid value is `false`, as this is only supported when creating new network interfaces when launching an instance.

deviceIndex.description: Integer index of the network interface attachment. Limited by instance type.

networkCardIndex.description: Integer index of the network card. Limited by instance type. The default index is `0`.

networkInterfaceId.description: ID of the network interface to attach.
